00022 #include "mt/proto/smpp/pdu/submit_multi.hpp"
00023 
00026 Smpp::SubmitMulti::SubmitMulti() :
00027     Request(CommandLength(MinLength),
00028     CommandId(CommandId::SubmitMulti),
00029     SequenceNumber::Min)
00030 {
00031 }
00032 
00049 Smpp::SubmitMulti::SubmitMulti(
00050         const SequenceNumber& sequenceNumber,
00051         const ServiceType& serviceType,
00052         const SmeAddress& sourceAddr,
00053         const EsmClass& esmClass,
00054         const ProtocolId& protocolId,
00055         const PriorityFlag& priorityFlag,
00056         const Smpp::Time& scheduleDeliveryTime,
00057         const Smpp::Time& validityPeriod,
00058         const RegisteredDelivery& registeredDelivery,
00059         const ReplaceIfPresentFlag& replaceIfPresentFlag,
00060         const DataCoding& dataCoding,
00061         const SmDefaultMsgId& smDefaultMsgId,
00062         const ShortMessage& shortMessage) :
00063     Request(CommandLength(MinLength),
00064              CommandId(CommandId::SubmitMulti),
00065              sequenceNumber),
00066     service_type_(serviceType),
00067     source_addr_(sourceAddr),
00068     esm_class_(esmClass),
00069     protocol_id_(protocolId),
00070     priority_flag_(priorityFlag),
00071     schedule_delivery_time_(scheduleDeliveryTime),
00072     validity_period_(validityPeriod),
00073     registered_delivery_(registeredDelivery),
00074     replace_if_present_flag_(replaceIfPresentFlag),
00075     data_coding_(dataCoding),
00076     sm_default_msg_id_(smDefaultMsgId),
00077     short_message_(shortMessage)
00078 {
00079     Header::update_length(service_type_.length() +
00080                            source_addr_.address().length() +
00081                            schedule_delivery_time_.length() +
00082                            validity_period_.length() +
00083                            short_message_.length());
00084 }
00085 
00088 Smpp::SubmitMulti::SubmitMulti(const Smpp::Uint8* b) :
00089     Request(CommandLength(MinLength), CommandId(CommandId::SubmitMulti), 1)
00090 {
00091     decode(b);
00092 }

00094 Smpp::SubmitMulti::~SubmitMulti()
00095 {
00096 }
00097 
00101 const Smpp::Uint8*
00102 Smpp::SubmitMulti::encode()
00103 {
00104     buff_.reset(Header::command_length());
00105 
00106     Request::encode(buff_); // insert the header first
00107     buff_ += service_type_;
00108     buff_ += source_addr_;
00109     buff_ += destination_addr_;
00110     buff_ += esm_class_;
00111     buff_ += protocol_id_;
00112     buff_ += priority_flag_;
00113     buff_ += schedule_delivery_time_;
00114     buff_ += validity_period_;
00115     buff_ += registered_delivery_;
00116     buff_ += replace_if_present_flag_;
00117     buff_ += data_coding_;
00118     buff_ += sm_default_msg_id_;
00119     buff_ += short_message_;
00120 
00121     Header::encode_tlvs(buff_);
00122 
00123     return buff_.get();
00124 }
00125 
00129 void
00130 Smpp::SubmitMulti::decode(const Smpp::Uint8* buff)
00131 {
00132     Request::decode(buff);
00133 
00134     Smpp::Uint32 len = Request::command_length();
00135     Smpp::Uint32 offset = 16;
00136     const char* err = "Invalid command_length";
00137     if(len < offset)
00138         throw Error(err);
00139 
00140     // cast to Smpp::Char*
00141     const Smpp::Char* sptr = reinterpret_cast<const Smpp::Char*>(buff);
00142 
00143     service_type_ = (const Smpp::Char*)&sptr[offset];
00144     offset += service_type_.length() + 1;
00145     if(len < offset)
00146         throw Error(err);
00147 
00148     source_addr_.decode(buff+offset, len - offset);
00149     offset += source_addr_.address().length() + 3; // ton + npi + '\0'
00150     if(len < offset)
00151         throw Error(err);
00152 
00153     destination_addr_.decode(buff+offset, len - offset);
00154     offset += destination_addr_.octet_count();
00155     if(len < offset)
00156         throw Error(err);
00157 
00158     esm_class_ = buff[offset];
00159     ++offset;
00160     if(len < offset)
00161         throw Error(err);
00162 
00163     protocol_id_ = buff[offset];
00164     ++offset;
00165     if(len < offset)
00166         throw Error(err);
00167 
00168     priority_flag_ = buff[offset];
00169     ++offset;
00170     if(len < offset)
00171         throw Error(err);
00172 
00173     schedule_delivery_time_ = &sptr[offset];
00174     if(len < offset)
00175         throw Error(err);
00176 
00177     offset += schedule_delivery_time_.length() + 1;
00178     if(len < offset)
00179         throw Error(err);
00180 
00181     validity_period_ = &sptr[offset];
00182     if(len < offset)
00183         throw Error(err);
00184 
00185     offset += validity_period_.length() + 1;
00186     if(len < offset)
00187         throw Error(err);
00188 
00189     registered_delivery_ = buff[offset];
00190     ++offset;
00191     if(len < offset)
00192         throw Error(err);
00193 
00194     replace_if_present_flag_ = buff[offset];
00195     ++offset;
00196     if(len < offset)
00197         throw Error(err);
00198 
00199     data_coding_ = buff[offset];
00200     ++offset;
00201     if(len < offset)
00202         throw Error(err);
00203 
00204     sm_default_msg_id_ = buff[offset];
00205     ++offset;
00206     if(len < offset)
00207         throw Error(err);
00208 
00209     short_message_ = buff+offset;
00210     offset += short_message_.length() + 1; // plus sm_length
00211     if(len < offset)
00212         throw Error(err);
00213 
00214     Header::decode_tlvs(buff + offset, len - offset);
00215 }
